audioText: Cette ancienne fumeuse s'est montrée très courageuse en arrêtant complètement de fumer après vingt ans de dépendance au tabac.
question: How did this former smoker show courage?
options: By completely stopping smoking after twenty years of tobacco addiction
By reducing the number of cigarettes gradually over time
By switching to electronic cigarettes as an alternative
By joining a support group for people with addictions
explanation: The text states 'Cette ancienne fumeuse s'est montrée très courageuse en arrêtant complètement de fumer après vingt ans de dépendance au tabac' - This former smoker showed great courage by completely stopping smoking after twenty years of tobacco addiction. 'Montrée' is the past participle of 'montrer' in the reflexive form 'se montrer'.
